phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
As long as he has that recovery magic,
I will not be able to finish him off!
that I, a royal, ever acknowledged.
I will throw enough at him from the both of us!
Like hell I will let that happen!
I do not have any magic,
I do not really get it, but I did it!
I would always close my eyes
Of just making excuses to give up
I do not want to be near you
(The decisive battle is still a long way off)
I will give up on giving up
And get the world on my side
I am looking for the reason I am alive
Every time somewhere under this sky
And head where the light shines
I want to keep my promise
I will deliver it to you
Mimosa, I am fine now, so please just take care of Asta!
I am not sure if my remaining magic will be enough.
Where is all that energy you just had?!
You cannot die before I kill you!
When things get rough, remember the faces of those you love.
We were born to protect the people of this kingdom that we love so much.
Once we become strong enough to protect this kingdom, we will be allowed to go outside.
You will probably make it out first, Mars.
I mean, you are the strongest out of all of us, Mars.
I will be waiting for you when that happens.
Until you get out, too, Fana.
Let us go see the outside world together.
The sole survivor will be allowed to go outside as our kingdom's mage warrior.
If you refuse, you will all be disposed of.
Looks like Mars is the one who survived.
Then let us implant him with the magic stones.
Let us go ahead and give him Fana's powers, too, since she was
Now we will finally have the ultimate mage warrior.
because I have extremely powerful magic.
Someone as naIve as you cannot win against me!
His flame recovery magic should have been negated by Asta's attack.
This is the perfect opportunity to finish him, but...
Just a little more, and I can break through these restraints.
No matter what spell I pick from my grimoire, I will not make it in time.
I will not let him die here!
There was a little girl, and...
we have defeated him for sure this time.
It might be a waste to let someone that strong die here.
We will not make it out in time.
Mimosa cannot use her Magic Flower Guidepost right now.
I have already acknowledged you as my... as our friend!
We will get out of here...
We sure were lucky they created a path for us.
Because of this old man's ultimate trump card, Hermit's Thick Smoke,
they never realized we were close by the whole time.
Anyway, thank goodness you are alive.
If I did not do that, you would not have...
Thanks to you, I was able to get all this treasure.
Now the people of our kingdom, as well as my daughters,
will be able to eat delicious things.
Make sure you go see the world outside.
You can actually say things like that.
As long as you are okay, Stupidsta.
He is resilient, if nothing else.
I am more than just resilient... ow, ow, ow...
I did not have enough magic to fully heal you.
I just did what I could for now, so you probably should not move.
I thought you were going to die before I got to kill you.
Not until I become the Wizard King.
I am the one who is going to be the Wizard King.
Do not use my body as a crutch.
It is not like I am hurting you.
I am so ashamed that I did not acknowledge you just because you were peasants!
magnificent Magic Knights of the Clover Kingdom!
Who knew you were such a good four-eyes?
What do you mean by that, you fool?!
You are just too serious, Klaus.
Your clothes are all ripped up.
My dry emotions gaze at the me from that day
(I cannot find a place to go)
Even the faintest light can still break through the darkness
And change the flow of time
In order to grasp my endless dream
If there is a path that I should choose
Until my life comes to an end
I will accept any pain that comes my way
(We can try again, we can try again)
Even if we cannot see tomorrow
Holding onto feelings too intense to voice
I will keep screaming them in my heart
So You Can Actually Say Things Like That
So You Can Actually Say Things Like That.
You can actually say things like that.

Peter Piper picked... a pick of peckled pippers.
